title: Nardah General Store.

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Nardah General Store is a general store located in Nardah, owned by Kazemde. It sells very basic goods, and will buy any tradeable items sold to it.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Nardah General Store
Nardah General Store.
Released5 December 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
Minimap icon
LocationNardah
OwnerKazemde
SpecialtyGeneral store
Location

The Nardah General Store is a general store located in Nardah, owned by Kazemde. It sells very basic goods, and will buy any tradeable items sold to it.

Stock[edit | edit source]

Sells at: 130.0% • Buys at: 40.0% • Change per: 3.0%
